7300649C.Line1.BAE4.Dru: Creatures run free inside. No one to hinder them.

73008D67.Line1.BAE4.Nec: A house of the Zakarum...left alone to rot?

73009FB9.Line1.BAE4.Rog: No monks, no wards...why do I feel I am being watched?

7300A405.Line1.BAE4.Sor: This place has been taken. It reeks of forbidden spells.

A970ACF3.VoiceDir1.BAE4.Bar: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.

A970B7A9.VoiceDir1.BAE4.Dru: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.

A970E074.VoiceDir1.BAE4.Nec: To self. Mild contempt for Zakarum. Wary.

A970F2C6.VoiceDir1.BAE4.Rog: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.
